name: Katarzyna
coverLetter:
Until  present time I have been working on a legal Cannabis farm in Applegate OR., which grows over 7400 plants. I have worked every part of harvest and I Am a Bud Manicurist/Trimmer.  Prior to this job I worked as an independent Trimmer booked by multiple agencies. 
I love and respect the Cannabis plant. i have a great deal to offer and I love learning and growing in this industry. 

Outside of the Cannabis industry  I am a personal Concierge. 
I relocated from the East Coast a year ago, from Key West, FL.
You may visit my website  www.ToDoListKeyWest.com

I will soon represent cities on the West Coast.
I also have interest in merging both my passions,  Cannabis and Concierging into one.

I am professional, detail and honorable.  
I am available to commit to the right project.
